numbrix
Class NumbrixControl

java.lang.Object
  numbrix.NumbrixControl

public class NumbrixControl
extends java.lang.Object

A controller for the the GUI of the Numbrix game. Performs all actions and interactions related to the game.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Sam Eary

Parameters:

Returns:

addEntry

public void addEntry(java.lang.String entry,
                     int row,
                     int col)
              throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                     InvalidGameStateException
Adds entries to the game-board.

Parameters:
entry - The string of the number to be sent to the game-board.
row - The row of the number sent to the game-board.
col - The column of the number sent to the game-board.
Throws:
java.lang.NumberFormatException - If an integer was entered for the entry.
InvalidGameStateException - If the entry is not valid.

isComplete

public boolean isComplete()
Gets the games completion status.

Returns:
true if the game is complete, false otherwise.

getFirstEmptySpace

public int[] getFirstEmptySpace()
Finds the first empty space on the game-board.

Returns:
an array containing the row and column of the empty space.

createNewBlankGame

public int createNewBlankGame(java.lang.String row,
                              java.lang.String col)
Creates a new blank game based on the sizes entered.

Parameters:
row - The string representing the number of rows.
col - The string representing the number of columns.
Returns:
VALID if the game was created, INTEGERS_ONLY if row or col entries were not integers, or INVALID_SIZE if the size of the game was too small.

unloadGame

public void unloadGame()
Erases the current game and starts a new one.
